description:
OR's favorite flannel, now offered in a lightweight version that's just as soft and comfortable in a cotton, polyester blend with two chest pockets for keeping valuables safe & looks great for everyday wear.

The Feedback Flannel Shirt Light is the perfect post-adventure shirt, office button-up, and active outdoor layer. Made from quick-drying and breathable fabric, this shirt will wick away moisture and keep you comfortable whether you're coming off a hike or a long day at work. Plus: Its UPF 50+ rating will protect you from the sun's harmful rays.
name: Outdoor Research Feedback Lightweight Flannel Shirt - Mens
